short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly get relevant information for the current view in GA and copy it to clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you will no longer have to navigate to the admin section within Google Analytics in order to get the tracking ID for the current property. The extension adds an icon at the bottom right of the page when visiting Google Analytics. When clicking this icon, a small information box will show where you will see information about the account, property and view. You can also copy the information for a specific attribute to the clipboard with a button. This will help you save a lot of time. 

New features in version 1.1:
- Support for GA4 properties.
